ygData.subject: RE: Favorite Weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: As far as 1HB goes, I have been using the Hammer of Wrath since the first time I could cast it. Everytime I level, I summon it, max my skill, and then destroy
ygData.messageBody:
As far as 1HB goes, I have been using the Hammer of Wrath since the first
time I could cast it. Everytime I level, I summon it, max my skill, and then
destroy it and go back to 2HB. I got lucky enough for a friend to hook me up
with an Observers Staff and I tend to stick with that in heavy combat (you
can't turn down +5 Wis, +30 mana and 25 consistent dmg). Hopefully one day
I'll be able to attain an Enamelled Black Mace or Gem-Encrusted Scepter ;)

Drizben D'Vorn
Defiled High Priest of Innoruuk


> From: "Sianne ." <maggee1@...>
>
> Just a question....what weapon do you guyz prefer..i have been striving
> for
> an observer staff..however i see most of my fellow clerics using one
> handed
> weapons...i am a little confused as to what i want to do....and one more
> question...is there any blackened armor that has any +wis?
>
> Sianne - Xegony
>
>
